LanguageData.VRE_FoliageHair.label: foliage hair
LanguageData.VRE_FoliageHair.description: Carriers of this gene have natural-looking, leafy hair.
LanguageData.VRE_HairColor_Anima.label: anima hair
LanguageData.VRE_HairColor_Anima.description: Carriers of this gene have a particular hair color. With multiple hair color genes, one is randomly selected.
LanguageData.VRE_HairColor_Gauranlen.label: gauranlen hair
LanguageData.VRE_HairColor_Gauranlen.description: Carriers of this gene have a particular hair color. With multiple hair color genes, one is randomly selected.
LanguageData.VRE_HairColor_Pollux.label: pollux hair
LanguageData.VRE_HairColor_Pollux.description: Carriers of this gene have a particular hair color. With multiple hair color genes, one is randomly selected.
